content: x 9 slip_stitch to the beginning stdc or make an invisible join fasten_off 20dc 10fpdc r4 colour d stdc in any double_crochet aper a fpdc from r3 double_crochet into same st double_crochet into next st fpdc around fpdc from r3 *2dc into next st double_crochet fpdc around fpdc from r3* x 9 slip_stitch to the beginning stdc or make an invisible join fasten_off 30dc 10fpdc leave a st marker in a fpdc st from r4 count 10 sts and mark it with a st marker repeat around all 4 corners should be marked and equally spaced r5 colour e scr in st marked with a st marker 1tr ch2 2tr into same st *treble_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet remove st marker 2tr ch2 2tr into st marked* x 4 omidng final 2tr ch2 2tr slip_stitch to beginning scr or make an invisible join fasten_off 24tr 16dc 12hdc 4 ch2sp n b on r6 and r7 don t miss the st aher the corner space it can be easily overlooked r6 colour f scr in any corner ch2sp 1tr ch2 2tr into same ch2sp *treble_crochet 11dc treble_crochet 2tr ch2 2tr in ch2sp* x 4 omidng final 2tr ch2 2tr slip_stitch to beginning scr or make an invisible join fasten_off 24tr 44dc 4 ch2sp r7 colour g stsc in any corner ch2sp ch2 single_crochet into same ch2sp *17sc single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch2sp* x 4 omidng final single_crochet ch2 single_crochet slip_stitch to beginning stsc fasten_off 76sc 4 ch2sp your sunbeams granny square is finished i d love to see your version of the sunbeams granny square so please tag me @crochetdahlia #sunbeamsgrannysquare if you have any issues with the pattern please do not hesitate to contact me via email crochetdahliaofficial@gmail com or social media this pattern cannot be altered distributed or sold but items made from this pattern may be sold provided @crochetdahlia is acknowledged as the designer karen x
